verses.verse: You shall not raise <WH5375> a false <WH7723> report <WH8088>: put <WH7896> not your hand <WH3027> with the wicked <WH7563> to be an unrighteous <WH2555> witness <WH5707>.
You shall not follow <WH310> a multitude <WH7227> to do evil <WH7451>; neither shall you speak <WH6030> in a cause <WH7379> to decline <WH5186> after <WH310> many <WH7227> to bend judgment <WH5186>:
Neither shall you favor <WH1921> a poor <WH1800> man in his cause <WH7379>.
If you meet <WH6293> your enemy <WH341>'s ox <WH7794> or his donkey <WH2543> going astray <WH8582>, you shall surely <WH7725> bring it back <WH7725> to him again <WH7725>.

If you see <WH7200> the donkey <WH2543> of him that hates <WH8130> you lying <WH7257> under his burden <WH4853>, and would not want <WH2308> to help <WH5800> him <WH5800>, you shall surely help with him <WH5800>.
You shall not bend <WH5186> the judgment <WH4941> of your poor <WH34> in his cause <WH7379>.
Keep you far <WH7368> from a false <WH8267> matter <WH1697>; and the innocent <WH5355> and righteous <WH6662> kill <WH2026> you not <WH6663>: for I will not justify the wicked <WH7563>.
And you shall take <WH3947> no gift <WH7810>: for the gift <WH7810> blinds <WH5786> the wise <WH6493>, and perverts <WH5557> the words <WH1697> of the righteous <WH6662>.

Also you shall not oppress <WH3905> a stranger <WH1616>: for you know <WH3045> the heart <WH5315> of a stranger <WH1616>, seeing <WH3588> you were strangers <WH1616> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And six <WH8337> years <WH8141> you shall sow <WH2232> your land <WH776>, and shall gather <WH622> in the fruits there <WH8393>.

But the seventh <WH7637> year you shall let it rest <WH8058> and lie <WH5203> still <WH34>; that the poor of your people <WH5971> may eat <WH398>: and what they leave <WH3499> the animals <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall eat <WH398>. In like manner you shall deal <WH6213> with your vineyard <WH3754>, and with your oliveyard <WH2132>.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> you shall do <WH6213> your work <WH4639>, and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> you shall rest <WH7673>: that your ox <WH7794> and your donkey <WH2543> may rest <WH5117>, and the son <WH1121> of your handmaid <WH519>, and the stranger <WH1616>, may be refreshed <WH5314>.

And in all things that I have said <WH559> unto you be circumspect <WH8104>: and make no mention <WH2142> of the name <WH8034> of other <WH312> gods <WH430>, neither let it be heard <WH8085> out <WH5921> of your mouth <WH6310>.
Three <WH7969> times <WH7272> you shall keep a feast <WH2287> unto me in the year <WH8141>.

You shall keep <WH8104> the feast <WH2282> of unleavened bread <WH4682>: you shall eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, as I commanded <WH6680> you in the time appointed <WH4150> of the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24>; for in it you came out <WH3318> from Egypt <WH4714>: and none shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> me empty <WH7387>:)

And the feast <WH2282> of harvest <WH7105>, the firstfruits <WH1061> of your labors <WH4639>, which you hast sown <WH2232> in the field <WH7704>: and the feast <WH2282> of ingathering <WH614>, which is in the end <WH3318> of the year <WH8141>, when you hast gathered <WH622> in your labors <WH4639> out of the field <WH7704>.
Three <WH7969> times <WH6471> in the year <WH8141> all your males <WH2138> shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH113> God <WH3068>.

You shall not offer <WH2076> the blood <WH1818> of my sacrifice <WH2077> with leavened bread <WH2557>; neither shall the fat <WH2459> of my sacrifice <WH2282> remain <WH3885> until the morning <WH1242>.

The first <WH7225> of the firstfruits <WH1061> of your land <WH127> you shall bring <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>. you shall not boil <WH1310> a kid <WH1423> in his mother <WH517>'s milk <WH2461>.
Behold <WH7971>, I send an Angel <WH4397> before <WH6440> you to keep <WH8104> you in the way <WH1870>, and to bring <WH935> you into the place <WH4725> which I have prepared <WH3559>.
Beware <WH8104> of <WH6440> him <WH8085>, and obey his voice <WH6963>, provoke <WH4843> him not <WH5375>; for he will not pardon your transgressions <WH6588>: for my name <WH8034> is in him <WH7130>.

But if you shall indeed <WH8085> obey <WH8085> his voice <WH6963>, and do <WH6213> all that I speak <WH1696>; then I will be an enemy <WH340> unto your enemies <WH341>, and an adversary <WH6887> unto your adversaries <WH6696>.

For my Angel <WH4397> shall go <WH3212> before <WH6440> you and bring <WH935> you in unto the Amorites <WH567>, and the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Perizzites <WH6522>, and the Canaanites <WH3669>, the Hivites <WH2340>, and the Jebusites <WH2983>: and I will cut them off <WH3582>.

You shall not bow down <WH7812> to their gods <WH430>, nor serve <WH5647> them <WH6213>, nor do after their works <WH4639>: but you shall utterly <WH2040> overthrow <WH2040> them <WH7665>, and quite break down <WH7665> their images <WH4676>.

And you shall serve <WH5647> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and he shall bless <WH1288> your bread <WH3899>, and your water <WH4325>; and I will take <WH5493> sickness <WH4245> away <WH5493> from the midst of you <WH7130>.
There shall nothing cast their young <WH7921>, nor be childless <WH6135>, in your land <WH776>: the number <WH4557> of your days <WH3117> I will fulfill <WH4390>.

I will send <WH7971> my fear <WH367> before <WH6440> you and will destroy <WH2000> all the people <WH5971> to whom you shall come <WH935>, and I will make <WH5414> all your enemies <WH341> turn their backs unto you <WH6203>.
And I will send <WH7971> hornets <WH6880> before <WH6440> you which shall drive out <WH1644> the Hivite <WH2340>, the Canaanite <WH3669>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, from before you <WH6440>.

I will not drive them out <WH1644> from before <WH6440> you in one <WH259> year <WH8141>; lest the land <WH776> become desolate <WH8077>, and the animal <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> multiply against you <WH7227>.
By little <WH4592> and little <WH4592> I will drive them out <WH1644> from before <WH6440> you until you be increased <WH6509>, and inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776>.

And I will set <WH7896> your bounds <WH1366> from the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> even unto the sea <WH3220> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and from the desert <WH4057> unto the River <WH5104>: for I will deliver <WH5414> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> into your hand <WH3027>; and you shall drive them out <WH1644> before you <WH6440>.
You shall make <WH3772> no covenant <WH1285> with them <WH430>, nor with their gods.
They shall not live <WH3427> in your land <WH776>, lest they make you sin <WH2398> against me <WH5647>: for if you serve their gods <WH430>, it will surely be a snare unto you <WH4170>.
